course.subject: CHEM
course.name: Symmetry in Chemistry and Spectroscopy
course.description: Symmetry principle and group theory, molecular spectroscopy, advanced topics in molecular orbital theory and bonding, chemical kinetics.
course.prerequisites: CHEM 2110 AND CHEM 2210 AND CHEM 2410

reviews.author: LukaModric
reviews.comment_content:
PART – I : Basics of Symmetry Principle and Group Theory.
Chapter 1: Introduction - Why Group Theory for Chemistry?
Chapter 2: Classification of Symmetry Transformations
Chapter 3: Classification of Figures ( i.e., static models of molecular structures ) - Chirality
Chapter 4: Point Groups - The Basic Concepts
Chapter 5: Point Groups - Group Elements, Class Structure, Figure Recognition, Relationships
Chapter 6: Representation of Point Groups - Character Tables

PART – II : Applications of Symmetry Principle and Group Theory in Chemical Problems.
Chapter 7:  Symmetry and Physical(Chemical) Properties
Chapter 8:  Symmetry Aspect of MO Theory and Bonding
Chapter 9:  Symmetry Aspect of Molecular Vibrations
Chapter 10:  Symmetry Aspect of Electronic(& Vibronic) Spectroscopy-I (Non-transition metal compounds)
Chapter 11:  Symmetry Aspect of Ligand Field Theory and Electronic(& Vibronic) Spectroscopy-II (Transition Metal Compounds)
Chapter 12:  Symmetry Aspect of Chemical Reactions
Chapter 13*:  Non-rigid Symmetry and Dynamic Stereochemistry
Chapter 14*:  Special Topics on Symmetry and Group Theory in Chemistry ( solid state, supramolecular, magnetic… )

reviews.author: R_Liaw
reviews.title: 不能錯過
reviews.comment_content:
Ch1: introduction (Symmetry in different fields of chemistry)
Ch2,3: Symmetry Operations & Chirality
Ch4: Point Groups (definition of groups & subgroups, group properties, isomorphism)
Ch5: Point Groups in Chemistry
(Group elements, molecular example and graphical representation, subgroup, class structure)
Ch6: Character table

Mid-term: Ch1 to Ch6 only
main focus: Ch4 to Ch6

After mid-term:
Application in chemistry aspects
Ch7: transition chapter
Ch8: MO & Bonding
Ch9: Molecular Vibrations
Ch10: Electronic & Vibronic Spectroscopy
Ch12: Pericyclic Reaction

Not enough time for
Ch11: Ligand Field Theory
Ch13: Non-rigid Symmetry, Dynamic Stereochemistry
Ch14: Special Topics

呢科重點在於展現symmetry & group theory 在各個chemistry 領域的重要性
全新角度認識好多Chem aspect, 鍾意chem 的同學不能錯過
reviews.comment_teaching:
充滿激情 慷慨激昂 (個人建議唔好坐第一排, 個排係淋花位)
key points & focus 都好清楚
美中不足係pdf show 唔到ppt d animation, 要有上堂先會清楚
in-class example 好detail, step-by-step, 真係幫到理解
exercise suggest answer 有時有bug, 唔好淨背答案, 要自己做&理解
Prof 睇落好似好嚴但內心非常nice, 好肯答問題, mid-term check 卷見到有人嗰分唔夠高唔開心仲會安慰佢
reviews.comment_grading:
mid-term 50%:
mean: 66, sd: 20, over 70% students got above 70%

term paper 50% 無講分&stat
做得好真係會救到mid-term

To clarify a myth: 此course 有A+

有exchange-in嚟hea 讀會拉低mean
reviews.comment_workload:
Only 1 mid-term and a term paper
Mid-term covers Ch1-Ch6, requires understanding but not reciting

Term paper:
purpose: to apply what we've learnt in this course to a specific chemical problem/ a journal paper
Working topic: bonding or any type of spectroscopy or any chemical reaction or any physical or chemical property of a molecule
guideline 係上堂派, 唔好走嗰堂
guideline & requirement 都好清晰
無word/page limit, 普遍well focused 唔deadline fight 應該manageable
11月中俾guideline, deadline 係final exam period 後1日
ch8 開始就教application, cover AN chem, org chem, phy chem, inorg, 每個aspect 都有provide recommend journal paper, 都可以自己另外揾journal paper/ reaction 做topic.
